mapper.sql: APPL_NO, ACAD_SEQ, ACAD_TYPE_CODE, LAST_SCHL_YN, ENTR_DAY, GRDA_DAY, SCHL_CODE, SCHL_NAME, COLL_NAME, MAJ_NAME, GRAD_AVR, GRAD_FULL, GRDA_TYPE_CODE, QUAL_EXAM_DAY, QUAL_AREA_CODE, SCHL_ADDR, SCHL_TEL, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from APPL_ACAD
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into APPL_ACAD (APPL_NO, ACAD_SEQ, ACAD_TYPE_CODE, LAST_SCHL_YN, ENTR_DAY, GRDA_DAY, SCHL_CODE, SCHL_NAME, COLL_NAME, MAJ_NAME, GRAD_AVR, GRAD_FULL, GRDA_TYPE_CODE, QUAL_EXAM_DAY, QUAL_AREA_CODE, SCHL_ADDR, SCHL_TEL, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE) values (#{applNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acadSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acadTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastSchlYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grdaDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradAvr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradFull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grdaTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualExamDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schlAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schlTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDate,jdbcType=DATE})
